title: Load, Light, Toke.
author: Holydiver
citation: Holydiver. "Load, Light, Toke.: experience with DMT (ID 77922)". Erowid.org. Apr 2, 2009. erowid.org/exp/77922
report:
There I was

White powder

Lights off

Bed made

I lit the lighter

The powder quickly became oil

The oil seeped into the wool

1

2

3

can I do it???

Yes I can I take the 4th cottony hit

4 Large hits through a bong

I hit the pillow

Impossible visions

I remember

Entities say hi

They say goodbye

I am waking up

Reality is becoming clear again

DMT hyperspace is folding back into the 3d world I'm used to.

I'm being reborn.

Now I remember who I am.

But I forget how it feels to breakthrough

I forget about the impossabilitys.

And on my life goes

Load, Light, Toke, Remember, Forget.
